attributes.action: Allow law abiding citizens of the UK to bear arms to protect themselves, their families and their property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Violent crime is growing and we want the right to protect ourselves.  People feel totally unprotected by the British Government, it's Police force and it's laws. The people who have the guns right now are the criminals.  Law abiding members of society should be able to protect themselves with a small firearm.
